p: Overall, the Department of Guatemala reported the highest number of cases followed by the Departments in the East of the country (i.e., Izabal, Zacapa, Santa Rosa, and El Progreso) ( Fig 5), with the incidence by 10,000 population being highest in Zacapa. In contrast, the Departments in the Central Highlands of the country, such as Sololá, Chimaltenango, Retalhuleu, Sacatepéquez, and Huehuetenango had low numbers, reporting less than 100 cases.Quetzaltenango, Jalapa and Izabal had low incidence, but a high proportion of samples were dengue-positive ( Fig 5).
